English: to return to the same school and repeat a course from which one has already graduated, as a result of failing to get good enough results to progress to one's desired higher-level school

d.f: `大陸地區~`指~`畢業生~`因~`考~`不上~`學校~，`回~`原~`校~`重讀~`已~`學~`過~`的~`課程~。

English: to return to the same school and repeat a course from which one has already graduated, as a result of failing to get good enough results to progress to one's desired higher-level school
